roleset.name: win, victory

example.name: just winner
example.text: Unlike other writers who either battled the fascists during the Civil War , or left Spain when Franco triumphed , Mr. Cela fought briefly on the general 's side , no doubt earning with his war wound some forbearance when he went on to depict a country with a high population of vagabonds , murderers and rural idiots trudging aimlessly through a dried - out land .

example.name: winner and competition
example.text: So much , too , for the notion that we humans triumphed in the Darwinian struggle by evolving big brains .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: `` Iraq has triumphed over its enemies , '' he said , `` and it will triumph in the remaining rounds of the battle . ''

example.name: arg 0
example.text: Eid - ul - Adha , which commemorates the trials and triumph of the Prophet Abraham .

example.name: with arg 1
example.text: He played a key role in President Bush 's election mess triumph over Al Gore

example.name: All args
example.text: Louisville 's triumph over Michigan in the final four

roleset.note: TRIUMPH-V NOTES: No appropriate Vncls. (from triumph.01-v)
TRIUMPH-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to triumph.01-v. Triumph.01 is a member of VN class Marvel-31.3-8. Framed by Katie. (from triumph.01-n)
